snippet: In allying himself with the anti-immigrant activist Kris Kobach, Mitt Romney has lurched toward the extremist right.
abstract: Editorial maintains that by accepting the endorsement of anti-immigrant activist Kris Kobach, Mitt Romney has again flip-flopped on his immigration policy, lurching toward the extremist right; notes Korbach has been the architect of the nation's most radical immigration crackdowns.
lead_paragraph: In allying himself with the anti-immigrant activist Kris Kobach, Mitt Romney has lurched toward the extremist right.
